mapper.select: SELECT*FROM chat_room WHERE (CHAT_MEMBER_1 = #{chat_member_1} AND CHAT_MEMBER_2 = #{chat_member_2}) OR (CHAT_MEMBER_2 = #{chat_member_1} AND CHAT_MEMBER_1 = #{chat_member_2})
SELECT member_nickname FROM MEMBER WHERE member_no = #{member_no}

SELECT c.room_no, c.chat_from, c.chat_content, c.chat_time, c.chat_read, m.member_image, m.member_nickname, m.member_state_no FROM chat c, member m WHERE (c.room_no, c.chat_time) IN ( SELECT room_no, MAX(chat_time) AS chat_time FROM chat WHERE chat_to = #{member_no} GROUP BY room_no ) AND c.chat_from = m.member_no ORDER BY c.chat_time DESC
